context: Youâ€™re looking at a forward-facing dash-cam view from a car driving at night on a multi-lane road approaching an intersection with traffic lights.
perception: The road is divided into multiple lanes with clear lane markings. The ego vehicle is in the leftmost lane of the main road. Ahead, a blue van is traveling in the same lane. The traffic light visible ahead is green, indicating permission to proceed. There is a right-turn-only lane separated by dashed lines on the right side. prediction: The blue van ahead will continue straight through the intersection as the light remains green. Traffic in other lanes will also proceed forward or turn right as indicated by lane markings and signals.
